original_text: Then Jesus' mother and his brothers came to see him. But they could not reach him because of the large crowd of people who were there.
korean_text: 예수의 어머니와 그 동생들이 왔으나 무리로 인하여 가까이 하지 못하니

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus' mother and his brothers came to see him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님의 어머니와 형제들이 그를 만나러 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: But they could not reach him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 그에게 다가갈 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: because of the large crowd of people
